title: Kuuma Kesä
description: A webzine about art, science, life, music, friends, philosophy, gaming, etc. with an emphasis on the interactive and the multimedia.

body.body: **kuuma kesä** (Finnish for “hot summer”) is my new *webzine* about stuff I like, which might be stuff you like, too!
Hopefully, every now and then I will publish a new issue, with all new content.

Here's what you might find in each issue: short messages about random stuff, news about me, facts about science, photographs of random things, drawings, paintings, videos, animations, bookmarks, playlists, mini games, fields recordings, music, but mostly: **nonsense** :)
Sounds good to you? Well read on, then!
